ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:41:21 [Issue ID 4000-106430] urn:comicvine:4000-106430 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:01:13. [Issue ID 89600]
ComicInfo.Summary: The events of the last issue have left Deadpool stranded in space. He now has to try to find a way home. He hitches a ride off a prison ship with some of the universe's most dangerous mercenaries. Of course, none of this is too much for Deadpool to handle.
ComicInfo.Title: Frag!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
